Jargon Term: pacemaker and found that the battery was not working
reverse the Coumadin that you take
the generator of your pacemaker was replaced
None of your medications were changed
You should take the antibiotic Augmentin 500mg two times per day for a total of 7 days.
You should return to the hospital if you notice that your heart rate is slow again or if you develop pain in your chest, shortness of breath, light headededness, fainting, or any concerning bleeding.
You should call your doctor if you continue to have pain with urination or notice blood in your urine despite taking this antibiotic. In addition you should be evaluated if you develop fever.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other
